Title: Requires reporting of employees of colleges and universities found responsible for sexual assault, dating violence, domestic violence, stalking, or sexual harassment
Summary: Requires reporting of employees of colleges and universities who were found responsible through the institution's decision-making process of sexual assault, dating violence, domestic violence, stalking, or sexual harassment; requires publication of certain information.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the reporting of employees of colleges and universities who were found responsible through the institution's decision-making process of sexual assault, dating violence, domestic violence, stalking, or sexual harassment; and requires publication of certain information
